scripts.text:
with content_find as (
	select 
		channel
		,sub_channel
		,content
		,activity_calendar_events
		, case 	
			when charindex('#changemakers', activity_calendar_events) > 1 then 'Changemakers'
			when charindex('#jcduk', activity_calendar_events) > 1 then 'A&P'
			when charindex('#results', activity_calendar_events) > 1 then 'Business/Industry'
			when charindex('#esg', activity_calendar_events) > 1 then 'ESG'
			when charindex('#teambehindthescreens', activity_calendar_events) > 1 then 'People'
			when charindex('#insight', activity_calendar_events) > 1 then 'Insights'
			when charindex('#programmatic', activity_calendar_events) > 1 then 'Programmatic'
				else 'Unspecified' end as contentFlag
	from Changemakers_Combined_Overview
	where activity_calendar_events is not null
	and (content is null or content = 'Unspecified')
)

update cco
	set cco.content = cf.contentFlag
from Changemakers_Combined_Overview cco
inner join content_find cf 
on cco.sub_channel = cf.sub_channel and cco.activity_calendar_events = cf.activity_calendar_events
where cf.contentFlag != 'Unspecified'
